title: Sex, Lies and Litigation
description: If you feel nostalgic for an era when people still fell in love on the Tube smoked in bars bar and social media didnâ€™t define us, these classic British chick lit books from one of the first vanguard of British Chick Lit authors will hit the spot.Set in London's Inns of Court & Notting Hill the fast paced action follows the courtroom and personal dramas of Evelyn a novice barrister. In London't hottest summer on record, her wig is on back to front; her high heels are falling to pieces on the ancient cobbled lanes of the Inns of Court; she's been out partying all night - and her prosecuting council turns out to be Giles her ex.Oh yes, and she's living in Notting Hill with Charles and Sam, a gay couple of girls who want her to find them a sperm donor. Her Gran would define this as a bad lipstick day. Hilarious and full of cracking one-liners. 'Brings to mind Kathy Lette and Jilly Cooper' Mail on Sunday UK'Bridget Jones on speed' The Guardian UK
author: Tyne O'Connell
